name: Coca cola 0,5
description: Classic Coca-Cola in a 500ml bottle. The original refreshing taste with its unique flavor that has been enjoyed worldwide for decades. Perfectly chilled for maximum enjoyment.

name: Pepsi 1L
description: Refreshing and fizzy Pepsi in a 1-liter bottle. The bold cola taste with a perfect balance of sweetness and carbonation. Ideal for parties and gatherings.

name: Lay's Classic Chips
description: Crispy golden potato chips with just the right amount of salt. Made from premium quality potatoes for that perfect crunch in every bite. A timeless snack favorite.

name: Snickers Bar
description: Delicious chocolate bar packed with nougat, caramel and roasted peanuts. The perfect combination of textures and flavors to satisfy your hunger and sweet tooth.

name: Nestle Water 1.5L
description: Pure, natural mineral water in a 1.5-liter bottle. Sourced from protected springs, it's perfect for daily hydration and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

name: Red Bull Energy Drink
description: The original energy drink that gives you wings. Contains taurine, caffeine and B-vitamins to improve concentration and reaction speed. Perfect for when you need an extra boost.

name: Fanta Orange 1L
description: Bright, bubbly orange soda with a bold citrus flavor. The perfect refreshing drink for hot summer days or anytime you crave something sweet and tangy.

name: Sprite Lemon-Lime 0.5L
description: Crisp, clean and lemon-lime flavored soda. Caffeine-free with a light, refreshing taste that cleanses your palate and quenches your thirst.

name: Cheetos Cheese
description: Irresistibly cheesy and crunchy corn snacks. That bold cheese flavor you love with the signature finger-dusting powder that makes them so addictive.

name: Twix Bar
description: Delicious cookie bars covered in caramel and milk chocolate. The perfect combination of crunchy cookie, gooey caramel and creamy chocolate in every bite.

name: BonAqua Water 1L
description: Pure, refreshing drinking water in a convenient 1-liter bottle. Perfect for staying hydrated at home, work or on the go. Clean taste with essential minerals.

name: Monster Energy
description: Powerful energy drink with a unique monster blend of energy ingredients. Double-sized can delivers twice the energy boost when you need it most.

name: Mirinda Strawberry
description: Sweet, fruity strawberry flavored soda with vibrant red color and bubbly carbonation. A fun, flavorful alternative to traditional citrus sodas.

name: Pringles Original
description: Iconic stackable potato crisps with their unique saddle shape and perfect crunch. The original savory flavor that started the Pringles phenomenon.

name: Bounty Bar
description: Tropical paradise in every bite - moist coconut filling enveloped in rich milk chocolate. A taste of the tropics wherever you are.

name: Lipton Ice Tea Peach
description: Refreshing iced tea with natural peach flavor. Brewed from real tea leaves for authentic taste, with just the right amount of sweetness.

name: Pepsi Max 0.5L
description: All the great Pepsi taste with zero sugar. Bold cola flavor with maximum taste but no calories. Perfect for those watching their sugar intake.

name: 7UP Mojito
description: Limited edition 7UP with refreshing mojito flavor. Crisp lemon-lime soda with a hint of mint for a uniquely refreshing experience.

name: KitKat Bar
description: Crispy wafer fingers covered in smooth milk chocolate. The perfect break-time treat with its signature snap and satisfying texture.

name: Nestle Water 0.5L
description: Compact 500ml bottle of pure natural mineral water. Perfect for on-the-go hydration with its convenient size that fits in bags and cup holders.

name: Burn Energy Drink
description: Intense energy drink with powerful formula to fuel your adventures. Contains caffeine, taurine and guarana for maximum energy boost when you need it.
